amendment.description: Relating to extension and modification of emergency unemployment compensation program.

action.text: Motion to table amendment SA 2631 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 98 - 0. Record Vote Number: 22.
Cloture on amendment SA 2631 not invoked in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 52 - 48. Record Vote Number: 9.
Cloture motion on amendment SA 2631 presented in Senate.
Amendment SA 2631 proposed by Senator Reid for Senator Reed.
